lead_paragraph: Mrs. Franklin D. Roosevelt has "adopted" her third child war refugee, it was disclosed yesterday by Mrs. Edna Blue, executive chairman of the Foster Parents Plan for War Children, 55 West Forty-second Street. The 3 1/2-year-oId British boy, Thomas Maloney, is one of nine children in rural refuges maintained in the British Isles by the Foster Parents Plan.
abstract: Foster Parents Plan for War Children announces 3d refugee "adoption" by Mrs F D Roosevelt
